body.raw:
<aeRuleset type="EventBasedRule" version="1">
  <rulePopulation version="1">
    <assignableNodeType>BackupClient</assignableNodeType>
    <rootEventType>Backupjob</rootEventType>
  </rulePopulation>
  <alertTrigger version="1" type="Filter">
    <description>Filter Failed Backup Jobs</description>
    <filterCondition version="1" type="scalarCondition">
      <value1 version="1" type="EventFieldValue">
        <name>status</name>
        <fieldType>STRING</fieldType>
        <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
        <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
      </value1>
      <value2 version="1" type="Constant">
        <name>Constant</name>
        <fieldType>STRING</fieldType>
        <value>failed</value>
      </value2>
      <operatorType>IS</operatorType>
    </filterCondition>
  </alertTrigger>
  <severity>Critical</severity>
  <alertTemplate version="1">
    <alertText>Backup of ${0} failed</alertText>
    <alertNodeClass>BackupClient</alertNodeClass>
    <attachedReportParameters>
      <AlertAttachedReport version="1">
        <name>Network Interface Errors</name>
        <description>Network Interface Errors</description>
        <nodePath>.\...\[type=Host]</nodePath>
        <nodeRole>Backup Server</nodeRole>
        <attachedReportType>NORMAL</attachedReportType>
        <type>Report</type>
        <timePeriod version="1">
          <type>CUSTOM</type>
          <customPeriod version="1">
            <startTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>startTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>Before</relativeTimeType>
            </startTime>
            <endTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>endTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>After</relativeTimeType>
            </endTime>
          </customPeriod>
        </timePeriod>
      </AlertAttachedReport>
      <AlertAttachedReport version="1">
        <name>Processor Utilization By Node</name>
        <description>Processor Utilization By Node</description>
        <nodePath>.\...\[type=Host]</nodePath>
        <nodeRole>Backup Server</nodeRole>
        <attachedReportType>NORMAL</attachedReportType>
        <type>Report</type>
        <timePeriod version="1">
          <type>CUSTOM</type>
          <customPeriod version="1">
            <startTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>startTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>Before</relativeTimeType>
            </startTime>
            <endTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>endTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>After</relativeTimeType>
            </endTime>
          </customPeriod>
        </timePeriod>
      </AlertAttachedReport>
      <AlertAttachedReport version="1">
        <name>Memory Utilization</name>
        <description>Memory Utilization</description>
        <nodePath>.\...\[type=Host]</nodePath>
        <nodeRole>Backup Server</nodeRole>
        <attachedReportType>NORMAL</attachedReportType>
        <type>Report</type>
        <timePeriod version="1">
          <type>CUSTOM</type>
          <customPeriod version="1">
            <startTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>startTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>Before</relativeTimeType>
            </startTime>
            <endTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>endTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>After</relativeTimeType>
            </endTime>
          </customPeriod>
        </timePeriod>
      </AlertAttachedReport>
      <AlertAttachedReport version="1">
        <name>Network Interface Errors</name>
        <description>Network Interface Errors</description>
        <nodePath>[type=Host,property:name=.name]</nodePath>
        <nodeRole>Backup Client</nodeRole>
        <attachedReportType>NORMAL</attachedReportType>
        <type>Report</type>
        <timePeriod version="1">
          <type>CUSTOM</type>
          <customPeriod version="1">
            <startTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>startTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>Before</relativeTimeType>
            </startTime>
            <endTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>endTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>After</relativeTimeType>
            </endTime>
          </customPeriod>
        </timePeriod>
      </AlertAttachedReport>
      <AlertAttachedReport version="1">
        <name>Processor Utilization By Node</name>
        <description>Processor Utilization By Node</description>
        <nodePath>[type=Host,property:name=.name]</nodePath>
        <nodeRole>Backup Client</nodeRole>
        <attachedReportType>NORMAL</attachedReportType>
        <type>Report</type>
        <timePeriod version="1">
          <type>CUSTOM</type>
          <customPeriod version="1">
            <startTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>startTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>Before</relativeTimeType>
            </startTime>
            <endTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>endTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>After</relativeTimeType>
            </endTime>
          </customPeriod>
        </timePeriod>
      </AlertAttachedReport>
      <AlertAttachedReport version="1">
        <name>Memory Utilization</name>
        <description>Memory Utilization</description>
        <nodePath>[type=Host,property:name=.name]</nodePath>
        <nodeRole>Backup Client</nodeRole>
        <attachedReportType>NORMAL</attachedReportType>
        <type>Report</type>
        <timePeriod version="1">
          <type>CUSTOM</type>
          <customPeriod version="1">
            <startTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>startTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>Before</relativeTimeType>
            </startTime>
            <endTime version="1" timeType="RelativeToAttribute">
              <name>endTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
              <relativeTimeValue>1800</relativeTimeValue>
              <relativeTimeType>After</relativeTimeType>
            </endTime>
          </customPeriod>
        </timePeriod>
      </AlertAttachedReport>
      <AlertAttachedReport version="1">
        <variables>
          <variable>
            <name>Id</name>
            <value version="1" type="EventFieldValue">
              <name>jobName</name>
              <fieldType>STRING</fieldType>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
            </value>
          </variable>
        </variables>
        <name>Root Cause For Backup Control Panel</name>
        <description>Root Cause For Backup Control Panel</description>
        <attachedReportType>ROOT_CAUSE</attachedReportType>
        <type>ControlPanel</type>
        <timePeriod version="1">
          <type>CUSTOM</type>
          <customPeriod version="1">
            <startTime version="1" timeType="TimeAttribute">
              <name>startTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
            </startTime>
            <endTime version="1" timeType="TimeAttribute">
              <name>endTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
            </endTime>
          </customPeriod>
        </timePeriod>
      </AlertAttachedReport>
      <AlertAttachedReport version="1">
        <variables>
          <variable>
            <name>Id</name>
            <value version="1" type="EventFieldValue">
              <name>jobName</name>
              <fieldType>STRING</fieldType>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
            </value>
          </variable>
        </variables>
        <name>Backup Job Topology</name>
        <description>Backup Job Topology</description>
        <attachedReportType>TOPOLOGY</attachedReportType>
        <type>Report</type>
        <timePeriod version="1">
          <type>CUSTOM</type>
          <customPeriod version="1">
            <startTime version="1" timeType="TimeAttribute">
              <name>startTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
            </startTime>
            <endTime version="1" timeType="TimeAttribute">
              <name>endTime</name>
              <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
              <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
            </endTime>
          </customPeriod>
        </timePeriod>
      </AlertAttachedReport>
    </attachedReportParameters>
    <orderedAlertParameters>
      <singleValue version="1" type="EventFieldValue">
        <name>jobName</name>
        <fieldType>STRING</fieldType>
        <relatedNodeType>BackupClient</relatedNodeType>
        <datamineClassName>Backupjob</datamineClassName>
      </singleValue>
    </orderedAlertParameters>
  </alertTemplate>
  <isSystem>false</isSystem>
  <name>Copy of Backup Failed2</name>
  <description>Alert if a backup job  failed</description>
  <rulesetType>EVENT_BASED</rulesetType>
  <category>DataProtection</category>
</aeRuleset>
